alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 10:53AM CDT until April 20 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and crest at 28.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Noxubee River Macon 26.0 21.2 Sun 10 am CD 27.8 26.9 23.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM CDT.
